trans-unit.source: Light object that projects its effect along a direction specified by a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 沿 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 指定的方向投射其效果的光对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight> objects have no position in space.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight> 对象具有在空间中的任何位置。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a light that projects its effect along a direction specified by a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />..
trans-unit.target: 构造沿 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 指定的方向投射其效果的光。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a light that projects its effect in a specified direction.
trans-unit.target: 创建在指定方向上投射其效果的光的实例。

trans-unit.source: This contructor creates an instance of a white light projected along a Vector3D of value `(0,0,-1)`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建的空白的浅值的 Vector3D 沿投影实例`(0,0,-1)`。

trans-unit.source: DirectionalLights have a direction, but no position in space.
trans-unit.target: DirectionalLights 具有一个方向，但在空间中的任何位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code excerpt creates a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码摘录创建<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight>。

trans-unit.source: Diffuse color of the new light.
trans-unit.target: 新光的漫射色。

trans-unit.source: Direction of the new light.
trans-unit.target: 新光的方向。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a light that projects its effect along a specified Vector3D with a specified color.
trans-unit.target: 创建用指定颜色沿指定的 Vector3D 投射其效果的光的实例。

trans-unit.source: DirectionalLights have a direction, but no position in space.
trans-unit.target: DirectionalLights 具有一个方向，但在空间中的任何位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code excerpt creates a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码摘录创建<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight" /> object, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the vector along which the light's effect will be seen on models in a 3-D scene.
trans-unit.target: 表示将在三维场景中的模型上沿其显示光效果的向量。

trans-unit.source: Vector3D along which the light projects, and which must have a non-zero magnitude.
trans-unit.target: 光沿其进行投影并且必须具有非零度量值的 Vector3D。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>(0,0,-1)</c>.
Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight.Direction" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight.Direction" /> 依赖项属性。
